name: Action Comics #1
description: First appearance of Superman, an iconic and groundbreaking issue.

description: First appearance of Spider-Man, a pivotal issue in Marvel history.

name: Detective Comics #27
description: First appearance of Batman, one of the most influential comic issues ever.

name: X-Men #1
description: First appearance of the X-Men and Magneto, an iconic issue for Marvel enthusiasts.

name: Marvel Comics #1
description: First appearance of the Human Torch and Namor, a must-have for collectors.

name: Incredible Hulk #1
description: First appearance of the Hulk, a major character in Marvel Universe.

name: All Star Comics #8
description: First appearance of Wonder Woman, a landmark in superhero history.

name: Amazing Spider-Man #1
description: First solo series for Spider-Man, an essential part of Marvel history.

name: Fantastic Four #1
description: First appearance of the Fantastic Four, launching Marvel’s superhero age.

name: Superman #1
description: First solo series for Superman, the world’s first superhero.

name: Avengers #1
description: First appearance of the Avengers, a key comic in Marvel’s universe.

name: Tales of Suspense #39
description: First appearance of Iron Man, a must-have for any serious collector.

name: Journey into Mystery #83
description: First appearance of Thor, another key figure in the Marvel Universe.

name: Batman #1
description: First solo series for Batman, featuring the Joker and Catwoman’s first appearances.

name: Flash Comics #1
description: First appearance of the Flash, a groundbreaking comic in the superhero genre.

name: Showcase #4
description: Reintroduction of the Flash, marking the start of the Silver Age of comics.

name: The Brave and the Bold #28
description: First appearance of the Justice League of America, uniting DC’s biggest heroes.

name: Captain America Comics #1
description: First appearance of Captain America, a WWII patriotic icon.

name: Green Lantern #1
description: First appearance of Hal Jordan as Green Lantern, a Silver Age classic.

name: Wonder Woman #1
description: First solo series for Wonder Woman, one of the most important characters in comics.
